definitions.title: v.b. Pilp.
definitions.body: chirp, peep (onomatip.; NH Pilp. id.; J Aram. [[חַפְחֵף]] chirp; Ar. s.ufs.ufun sparrow, etc.);—Impf. 3 fs. [[תְּחַפְחֵף]] Is 29:4, 1 s. [[אֲחַפְחֵף]] Is 38:14; Pt. [[מְחַפְחֵף]] Is 10:14, pl. [[הַמְפְחְפִים]] Is 8:19; —chirp, peep:
of birds Is 10:14 (fig. of conquered peoples); of mourning, ´[[אֲח]]…[[בְּסוּס]] Is 38:14 (‖[[אֶהְנֶּה בַּיּוֹנָה]]).
of spirits, ghosts Is 8:19 (+ [[הַמַּהְגִּים]]), ´[[מֵעָפָר אִמְרָתֵךְ תְּח]] Is 29:4 (like a spirit's).
